summary: This is a correspondence from the Chambers of Judge Alison J. Nathan transmitting the August 13 Opinion & Order and related motion papers in the case United States v. Maxwell (20cr330) to counsel, as per a previous court order.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Judge whose chambers sent the correspondence transmitting court documents in the case United States v. Maxwell.

events.title: Court Issues Opinion & Order
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued an Opinion & Order in the case United States v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is a transmittal of court filings in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell (docket number 20cr330).
The correspondence originates from the Chambers of Judge Alison J. Nathan.
The primary document being transmitted is an August 13, 2021 Opinion & Order issued by Judge Nathan.
The transmission is in compliance with a previous court order (Dkt. No. 325).
The attached files include multiple motions and exhibits related to the case.
